logger.doc:name: Start Logger
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId] Start Register Covid Case. payload: #[payload]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- { CREATED_BY: "UHUB", PHONE: payload.phone, STATE: payload.address.state, UPDATED: now() as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss"}, LAST_NAME: payload.lastName, EMAIL: payload.email, FIRST_NAME: payload.firstName, CASE_TYPE: payload.caseType, CREATED: now() as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss"}, NATIONAL_ID: payload.nationalID, CITY: payload.address.city, COUNTRY: payload.address.country, NATIONAL_ID_TYPE: payload.nationalIDType, POSTAL_CODE: payload.address.postal, SOURCE: payload.source, STREET_ADDRESS: payload.address.streetAddress, UPDATED_BY: "UHUB", DATE_OF_BIRTH: payload.dateOfBirth }

logger.doc:name: Finish Logger
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId] Finish Register Covid Case. payload: #[payload]
